holidays.title: International Kissing Day
holidays.description: From French kissing and a formal kiss on the cheek, celebrate this simple but powerful gesture.

holidays.title: National Fried Chicken Day
holidays.description: Fried chicken's a greasy, deliciously indulgent comfort food enjoyed all over the world.

holidays.title: Anniversary of the Coronation of King Mindaugas
holidays.description: A king was the Lord’s anointed, hallowed at his coronation with holy oil.

holidays.title: Capital City Day
holidays.description: Join Kazakhs across the globe as they celebrate their rich culture and identity.

holidays.title: Comoros National Day
holidays.description: After a tumultuous past, the people of Comoros have earned their independence.

holidays.title: Eid-e-Ghadir
holidays.description: Eid-e-Ghadir is a day of celebration and remembrance for Shia Muslims all over the world.

holidays.title: Fast of Shiva Asar B'Tammuz
holidays.description: Join Jewish people across the globe as they mark a day of tragedies in their history.

holidays.title: Fast of Tammuz
holidays.description: Take full advantage of this fast day as it’s also a day to repent.

holidays.title: Jan Hus Day in Czech Republic
holidays.description: Join us as we explore and delve into the life and death of Jan Hus.

holidays.title: Kupala Night
holidays.description: Let us explore the history behind this old Slavic celebration and its wonderful traditions together.

holidays.title: Malawi Independence Day
holidays.description: Let’s retrace the steps in Malawi’s history that led to their eventual autonomy.

holidays.title: MHIP Day in Mizoram
holidays.description: Explore the history of one of India’s oldest women’s welfare organizations on MHIP Day.

holidays.title: National Air Traffic Control Day
holidays.description: It’s the anniversary of the day the air traffic control system was established in the U.S.

holidays.title: National Daniel Day
holidays.description: Let's celebrate all the Daniels in the world on this National Daniel Day!

holidays.title: National Hand Roll Day
holidays.description: Nothing improves your mood more than a delicious homemade hand roll this National Hand Roll Day.

holidays.title: Take Your Webmaster to Lunch Day
holidays.description: Treat your webmaster to lunch or in some other way to show your appreciation.

holidays.title: Thirsty Thursday
holidays.description: Anyone who loves to live it up will surely love Thirsty Thursday!

holidays.title: Umbrella Cover Day
holidays.description: These little sleeves, slipcovers, cases, sheaths — whatever they may be — deserve our recognition.

holidays.title: Virtually Hug a Virtual Assistant Day
holidays.description: Virtual assistants are making the most of the digital frontier to advance their careers.

holidays.title: World Zoonoses Day
holidays.description: Zoonotic diseases can have serious effects on both humans and animals alike.

holidays.title: 50 Cent’s Birthday
holidays.description: From gangster to business mogul, 50 Cent has overcome every challenge thrown his way.

holidays.title: Frida Kahlo’s Birthday
holidays.description: This fierce, confident, and robust artist took on the world with her paintings!

holidays.title: George W. Bush’s Birthday
holidays.description: From oil to baseball, from art to politics, George W. Bush has done it all.

holidays.title: Kevin Hart’s Birthday
holidays.description: No subject is too serious for loveable comedian and actor Kevin Hart.

holidays.title: Ludwig Ahgren’s Birthday
holidays.description: From a novice streamer to breaking streaming records, this Twitch star is on the rise!

holidays.title: Sylvester Stallone’s Birthday
holidays.description: Heavyweight action actor Sylvester Stallone dominates every acting, directing, and producing role he takes on.

holidays.title: Tia Mowry’s Birthday
holidays.description: Although she’s a twin, actress, and mother, Tia Mowry is one of a kind!

holidays.title: Zion Williamson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This basketball player is super-talented and also a gorgeous heartthrob! Celebrate him today!
